        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>End date in the format of <code>YYYY-MM-DD</code>.</p>

            title="Required">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd><p>You can specify an email address to query.</p>
